title: COVID-19 Infectious Disease Expert: An Interview with Dr. Doug Drevets
itunes:title: COVID-19 Infectious Disease Expert: Interview with Dr. Doug Drevets
description: David Iglesias, Director of the Wheaton Center for Faith, Politics and Economics, interviews infectious disease specialist Dr. Doug Drevets '80 about COVID19. Dr. Drevets offers insights from science and faith to inform and encourage during these challenging times.
content:encoded: David Iglesias, Director of the Wheaton Center for Faith, Politics and Economics, interviews infectious disease specialist Dr. Doug Drevets '80 about COVID19. Dr. Drevets offers insights from science and faith to inform and encourage during these challenging times.
